title: Modular Engineering Education Course Design: Simulation/VR-Based Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering concepts and experience using engineering tools
context.additional_context: Customized modular design for in-service professionals emphasizing learning flexibility and autonomy

learning_goals: Learners can independently design engineering education modules by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model.
Learners develop at least three learning scenarios per module in simulation/VR environments.
Learners validate the connectivity and scalability between modules through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
